Playways

About Playways

Playways is a music visualiser and generative art app by Katrina Hayes, a web developer in Sydney.

The visualisation works by continually measuring a song's amplitude, and representing those measurements—and differences in those measurements—through circles of different sizes on the canvas. Every canvas comes out a little differently.

Listen to the preloaded songs by Ratatat or Elliot Smith, or switch to mic mode to create a visualisation from your environment—music you're playing through your computer, sounds you create with your own voice/instrument, etc.

If you create something interesting, take a screenshot and let me know. I'd love to see it!
